::DarkFate/Blacknightmare/::

Darkfate frowned and flew in his beast mode (A Dragon with 5 heads), 
and landed along side the protophorm. He changed to robot mode, with 
reveals a strong, red-golden, 12 feet body. His main-dragon head 
fellover his chest, revealing this robot's head. His other heads 
moved towards his chest and they put thier snake-like heads together 
the main. Even in his Robot mode Darkfate kept his Dragon's tail and 
wings (That are like bat's)

Blacknightmare arrived first and landed near of the place were 
protphorm was.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  The proto1000 turned to its liquid form and flowed down through 
the grass as 
> the bots flew closer. It tried to hide itself until thier 
intentions where 
> known.
